introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.description: Elixir UI is a super set of components for React. Built with CSS modules.

whatIsElixirUI.title: What is Elixir UI?
whatIsElixirUI.description: Elixir UI is a modern React component library designed to empower developers to build beautiful, responsive, and accessible user interfaces with speed and efficiency. It is a super set of components for React, built with CSS modules. Elixir UI is designed to be a flexible and extensible toolkit that can be used to build a wide variety of user interfaces. It is designed to be easy to use, easy to customize, and easy to extend. Elixir UI is designed to be a flexible and extensible toolkit that can be used to build a wide variety of user interfaces. It is designed to be easy to use, easy to customize, and easy to extend.
